issue.title: [CI][Rust] Enable more clippy lint checks
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9296](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9296). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently only `clippy::redundant_field_names` is allowed, so we should incrementally extend the list of enabled lints.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9296?focusedCommentId=17244338) by Neville Dipale (nevi_me):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8830
